title: Report: Disagreement between Nick Saban, Sarkisian led to exit
text:
Report: Disagreement between Nick Saban, Sarkisian led to exit Changes in offensive philosophy didn't fly with Saban, per reports. Slot to 247Sports Links 
Philosophical differences and a deteriorating relationship led to Steve Sarkisian leaving Alabama to become the new offensive coordinator for the Atlanta Falcons, multiple sources have confirmed to SB Nation . 
“There was an effort on Saban’s part not to repeat the same problem. This wasn’t going to work out,” a source close to Sarkisian told SB Nation's Steven Godfrey . 
RELATED : Kirk Herbstreit defines three Alabama OC candidates | Saban releases statement 
The relationship reportedly began to sour after Alabama's loss to Clemson in the national championship game during meetings involving next year's offense. 
That's when Saban and Sarkisian agreed it was time to move on and the Crimson Tide's OC began entertaining interests elsewhere. 
One SB Nation source confirmed the relationship was "too similar" to Saban and Lane Kiffin . Author
